_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: OpenMP
author: vedrancappone@gmail.com
description: A multiplayer mod for Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas that is fully backwards compatible with San Andreas Multiplayer.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

echo "running: curl -sSL -o openmp.tar.gz https://github.com/openmultiplayer/open.mp/releases/download/v1-RC2/open.mp-linux-x86-dynssl.tar.gz"
curl -sSL -o openmp.tar.gz https://github.com/openmultiplayer/open.mp/releases/download/v1-RC2/open.mp-linux-x86-dynssl.tar.gz

mkdir -p /mnt/server
tar -xzvf openmp.tar.gz --strip-components=1 -C /mnt/server/

cd /mnt/server || exit

echo "creating default config"

if [ -e conf.json ]; then
    echo "server config file exists"
else
    echo "Downloading default OpenMp config"
    curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/game_eggs/gta/openmp/confing.json >> confing.json
fi

chown -R root:root /mnt

export HOME=/mnt/server


echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"
